thread.title: Renaissance Baltimore Harborplace Hotel Expands Leadership Team

author: cnbc.com
title: Renaissance Baltimore Harborplace Hotel Expands Leadership Team
text:
BALTIMORE, April 06, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Renaissance Baltimore Harborplace Hotel proudly announces its new Director of Sales & Marketing, Jennifer Lewis, who brings decades of hospitality and sales experience to the iconic Baltimore Inner Harbor hotel .
Inner Harbor hotel welcomes Jennifer Lewis as new Director of Sales & Marketing.
Before joining the team at the Renaissance, Jennifer most recently worked as the Director of Sales and Marketing for the Kimpton Hotel Monaco Baltimore. Jennifer has extensive hotel experience after working on teams in both front and back of house, before discovering her penchant for sales. She has quickly risen through the ranks to her role as director and maintains that the best part of her position is challenging her team to surpass their goals.
A hospitality industry veteran, Jennifer brings over 25 years of experience to the senior leadership team of the popular hotel near downtown Baltimore . Perched along the edge of Baltimore’s beautiful Inner Harbor, the Renaissance Baltimore Harborplace Hotel has solidified itself as an iconic destination among locals and visitors alike.
A Southern California native and longtime Michigan resident, Jennifer currently resides outside of Baltimore in White Marsh. She enjoys traveling with her husband, spending time with her family, and is quick to note she’s both a proud mother and grandmother. Jennifer also enjoys being a frequent guest speaker for university students pursuing careers in hospitality.
Jennifer’s awards and accolades include the award for the highest RevPar Index at Hilton San Francisco, Ambassador of the Year from Mt. Pleasant Michigan, Circle of Excellence from LaBelle Management, the Hyatt Outstanding Production Award and Hyatt Masters Award.
With her addition to the leadership team, the Renaissance Baltimore Harborplace Hotel is poised to rise even higher in its place as one of the city’s most contemporary and stylish refuges by the water. The hotel near the Baltimore Convention Center brings the allure of Charm City to an entirely new level with sophisticated decor, thoughtful service and gorgeous views of the harbor. Its convenience for groups and guests attending local events and expos is unmatched.
For more information or to book a stay at the hotel, call 1-410-547-1200.
About the Renaissance Baltimore Harborplace Hotel
Renaissance Baltimore Harborplace Hotel grants guests access to the vibrant atmosphere of Baltimore's famed Inner Harbor, where waterfront views, luxury accommodations and remarkable service set the standard for downtown lodging. Laced with the city's charm and surrounded by an abundance of landmarks, this sophisticated hotel places guests near upscale shopping and fine dining in the heart of downtown. Offering a variety of accommodations, guests will find it easy to relax as all rooms feature luxury linens, marble bathrooms, enhanced high-speed Internet access and room service. Onsite amenities include the popular Watertable restaurant and lounge, a 24-hour fitness center and refreshing indoor pool. Conveniently situated near the Baltimore Convention Center, the hotel's impressive meeting and event space is ideal for hosting downtown conferences and elegant social events.
